name: addAZRLocation
description:
Add a location to the [location hierarchial structure(s)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115000342983-Zoom-Rooms-Location-Hierarchy) of Zoom Rooms in an account. **Prerequisites:** * Account owner or admin permissions. * Zoom Rooms Version 4.0 or higher

**Scopes:** `room:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

name.description: Name of the location. The name must be unique and shouldn't have already been used in the same account.

parent_location_id.description:
The location ID of the location that is a level higher from the location that is being added.

For example, to add a City named "City 1" as the child location under a State named "State 1", you must provide the location ID of "State 1". This can be retrieved using the [List Zoom Room Locations](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/rooms-location/listzrlocations) API.

$ul: **id**: Location ID: Unique Identifier of the location that was added.
**parent_location_id**: Unique Identifier of the parent location.
**type**: Type of location. The value should be one of the following:
